articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Twin Cities woman, 79, killed in Africa when elephant charges safari vehicle – Twin Cities - St. Paul Pioneer Press
articles.description: A bull elephant charged a truck that a 79-year-old Twin Cities woman was riding in with other tourists on a game drive in a Zambian national park.
articles.content:
